subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Marlins answered the Mets’ ninth-inning rally with one of their own when Jorge Cantu ripped a two-out single off Darren O’Day to drive in the winning run.
snippet: The Marlins answered the Mets’ ninth-inning rally with one of their own when Jorge Cantu ripped a two-out single off Darren O’Day to drive in the winning run.
